Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>闇の力<White>のありかを示した地図って、 ふたつの種族が力を合わせて作ったんだよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The map showing where the Power of Shade is was made by the two races working together, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう場合ってさ、その地図はどっちの種族が 持ってるんだろうね？
Entry.EnglishText: If that's the case, then which race is in possession of the map?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううむ……両方が持つか、共同で保管しているか、 あるいは、まったくの第三者に預けるか……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm...Would they each have a copy, would they have it in joint custody, or did they entrust it to a third party...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 案外、みんなが知ってたりして。 泉を開く方法さえ隠せばいいんだし。
Entry.EnglishText: Odd that so many people know about the map when they wanted to hide how to open up the spring.
